resources.string:
Welcome, Provider! 


As a provider, you can view the summary reports for children, but only when a parent shares their data with you. 

 Please wait for a parent to share more information about the child with you. 


# info about how to view summaries + reports

Welcome Child! 

 As a child you can log your medicines and symptoms, practice inhaler techniques, and track your asthma in a fun, safe way! 


Your data is private. Only your parent can share your information with your healthcare provider. 


# add more info about functionality once theyre implemented cuz idk

Welcome Parent! 

 You can link your children, view their health data, get alerts, and share a controlled summary with your healthcare provider. 

 You may link a child and provide general information or notes about them in the homepage.


You can log incidents for your child by...
